revised_title: The History of Emperor Tetricus and the Roman Empire
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Roman History
tldr: This article discusses the history of Emperor Tetricus and the Roman Empire, focusing on the role of medals in understanding and illustrating the events of that time. The author, Claude Gros de Boze, provides insights into the political and social landscape of the Roman Empire during Tetricus' reign, highlighting key events and figures of the era.
